brief_title: Evaluation of an Orally Administered Medication When Taken in Conjunction With Pramlintide
brief_summary: This is a randomized, single-blind, placebo-controlled, crossover study to examine the effect of pramlintide on the pharmacokinetics of an orally administered medication
description: Clear, colorless, sterile solution for SC injection.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Type 2 diabetes mellitus treated with diet and/or oral agents - HbA1c 6.5-11.0
